sense.def:
To apply to have something or to do something
pomeni uradno pisno prositi, da nam nekaj dovolijo imeti ali storiti.

gramGrp.pos:
REFL VB
or
VB
with
OBJ

sense.def:
To apply oneself to something
pomeni močno se osredotočiti na tisto.

seg.quote: He tried to apply his mind to Rose's problems.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
applies to a person or a situation
je povezano s tisto osebo ali okoliščinami.

To apply a rule, system, or skill
pomeni v določenih okoliščinah ali pri neki dejavnosti uporabljati neko pravilo, sistem ali spretnost.

seg.quote: ...the capacity to develop and apply technology.

sense.def:
To apply a name to someone or something
pomeni s tistim imenom imenovati neko osebo ali predmet.

seg.quote: Apply a little liquid wax polish.
